Posts.Content: Hello everyone Salutations to all cancer survivors This is my my first posting. I've had some unique experiences with my prostate cancer journey. I hope it would help some folks to make informative decisions with their treatment options My history : 2008 psa 3.11 2009 jan psa 4.69 2009 feb biopsy confirmed prostate cancer, 8/12 nodes infected) Gleason score = 7 (4+3) 2009 apr robotic prostatectomy, negative margin 2009 -2012 psa <0.1 2012 psa 0.1 2013 psa 0.2 and rising to 0.225 2014 feb-mar IMRT radiation 38 session 2014 apr-nov psa continues to rise from 0.234 to 0.55, no effect on psa from radiation 2015 jan-nov psa 0.67 rising to 1.12 2016 feb psa 2.54 2016 feb did C11 Choline PET/CT, discovered prostate cancer tissues in the lungs and nowhere else so blind radiation in the pelvic region was uncalled for, waste and invasive 2016 mar began LUPRON (3 month shot) 2016 april-sept 6 sessions of chemo (Docetaxyl) 2016 oct clean CT scan and bone scan 2016 sept to present psa <0.05 2017 psa <0.05 and continuation of LUPRON every 3 months
Posts.Title: Zero club membership renewal

Posts.Content: Thank you all for the warm welcome. I have updated my history above to include pathology reports and lung biopsy confirming prostate cancer in the lungs.
Posts.Title: Prostate Cancer Lung metastasis

Posts.Content: Hello everyone This is my first post. I've had some unique experiences with my prostate cancer journey and I hope it would help some folks make informative decisions in choosing treatment options My history : 2008 psa 3.11 2009 jan psa 4.69 2009 feb biopsy confirmed prostate cancer, 8/12 nodes infected) Gleason score = 7 (4+3) 2009 apr robotic prostatectomy, negative margin pathology report : Prostatic Adenocarcinome, Gleason Score 4+3=7, involving both prostate lobes Extensive perineural invasion present, associated with focal extracapsular tumor extension No definite vascular invasion identified Seminal vessels free of tumor Surgical margins of resection free of tumor Adcc staging : T3a, NX, MX 2009 -2012 psa <0.1 2012 psa 0.1 2013 psa 0.2 and rising to 0.225 2014 feb-mar IMRT radiation 38 session 2014 apr-nov psa continues to rise from 0.234 to 0.55, no effect on psa from radiation 2015 jan-nov psa 0.67 rising to 1.12 2016 feb psa 2.54 2016 feb did C11 Choline PET/CT, discovered prostate cancer tissues in the lungs and nowhere else so blind radiation in the pelvic region was uncalled for, waste and invasive Biopsy of lung tissue confirmed prostate cancer in both lungs identified 5 locations 2016 mar began LUPRON (3 month shot) 2016 april-sept 6 sessions of chemo (Docetaxyl) 2016 oct clean CT scan and bone scan 2016 sept to present psa <0.05 2017 psa <0.05 and continuation of LUPRON every 3 months
Posts.Title: Prostate Cancer Lung metastasis
